announcement.info: This semester, we will be meeting entirely online! Check your emails for Zoom links and more info.
Midterm grades have been released on Gradescope. See Piazza for more info.
Please submit regrade requests by Friday.
Sign up for small group tutoring if you need extra conceptual help and practice. See Piazza for more info.
Sign up for post-midterm advising if you would like to meet with staff to talk about studying tips, the midterm, etc. See Piazza for more info.
